pr_title: Change common sub-expression functions to return check flags and return result

timeline.bodyText: When you are at it - is it feasible to make all these also fields instead of passing so many arguments?
timeline.author: kaikalur

replies.bodyText: What do you mean? They are function parameters in evaluate as well, and these functions are called from evaluate. I think it makes more sense to keep them consistent.
replies.author: rongrong

replies.bodyText: I guess so. It's just that the whole param passing is unnecessary. Saves a few bytes in the method size too :) Hopefully the JIT will remove all that at least from performance point of view, it should be ok
replies.author: kaikalur

timeline.message: Change common sub-expression methods to return result
Change common sub-expression methods to return result
